short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays info about a course when the user hovers over its name on the McGill website. Not officially affiliated with McGill U.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays valuable information about a course when the user hovers over its name on the McGill University website.

To use this extension, go to a page on the McGill website. All course names will be colored blue by the extension. Hover over the blue text to see a popup displaying the name, post-requisites, and historical averages of that course.

This extension is not officially affiliated with McGill University.
